title: Hood Milk Logo and Hoodsie Cup
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know of the font used in the Hood logo or the font used in the Hoodsie Cup packaging?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010043323im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hp-hood_6211.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010043323im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Hoodsie%20Cups%20new_small_6351.jpg)

Thanks!
author: Al_868

comments.content: 'Hood' looks like Avant Garde Demi Bold.
